hibernate-mapping.query: from Program p join fetch p.Channel c where p.Title LIKE :name and p.TimeRange.End > :now order by p.TimeRange.Start asc, c.Number desc
select Count(p) from Program p where p.Title LIKE :name and p.TimeRange.End > :now
from Program p join fetch p.Attributes a where p.Title LIKE :name and p.TimeRange.End > :now
